DOC.brief_summary: The aim study empirically evaluate impact Dance/Movement Therapy program adapt old adult . Participants 60 year old enrol one three group : Dance/Movement Therapy , Aerobic Exercise Waiting List ( control group ) 12 week . The training group occur 3 time week 1 hour session . Physical condition , cognitive function , general health lifestyle , stress hormone assess baseline , 12 week 28 week .
DOC.brief_title: Dancing Better Aging : Evaluating Impact Dance/Movement Therapy ( D/MT ) Program Older Adults
DOC.criteria: age 60 year old sedentary moderately sedentary ( less 150 minute moderate vigorous exercise per week ) participate another similar study last year expose dance dance/movement therapy program past year wheelchair surgery past year smoke past 5 year consume 2 glass day alcohol treatment major depression progressive neurological disorder unstable medical condition ( unstable cardio illness past 6 month , cardiac thyroid trouble pituitary gland illness ) contraindication moderate physical activity ( major orthopaedic limitation ) suspicion cognitive problem ( score 24 less MiniMental State Examination ) large uncorrected perceptual limit treatment hormone therapy uncontrolled hearing loss
